benchmark_details.name: UnKEBench
benchmark_details.overview: UnKEBench is a newly proposed dataset specifically designed for unstructured knowledge editing tasks, aimed at accurately handling information-rich and free-format unstructured knowledge.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating unstructured knowledge editing methods, facilitating advancements in this area of research.

data.source: Generated through ChatGPT prompts based on real-world unstructured texts.
data.annotation: Annotated through automated processes and manual checks to ensure accuracy.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on lexical overlap and semantic similarity between edited outputs and target answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in editing unstructured knowledge.
